name: part_007
file: tmp_Airani iofifteen Birthday 2025 3D Live, Have a Nice Trip and Dream #iofiLucidDream [mMDPWutdkDM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: MC section with Airani Iofifteen, Rikka, and Kanade Izuru, discussing the possibility of forming a band.
Performance of the song 'Bokura no Let It Be' by Airani Iofifteen and Ayunda Risu.

subtitles.original: 歌、また...
subtitles.english: Let's sing again...

subtitles.original: ねえ、次はバンド？
subtitles.english: Hey, next a band?

subtitles.original: バンドやるか！
subtitles.english: Let's do a band!

subtitles.original: バンド。イオフィマラカス。
subtitles.english: Band. Iofi maracas.

subtitles.original: 練習時間めちゃかかりそうだけどね。
subtitles.english: Seems like it'll take a lot of practice time though.

subtitles.original: 確かに。イオフィドラムやったことないからね。
subtitles.english: True. Since Iofi hasn't played drums before.

subtitles.original: やるの？やるしかない！
subtitles.english: Doing it? We have no choice but to do it!

subtitles.original: やるなら練習しますよ。
subtitles.english: If we're doing it, I'll practice.

subtitles.original: あ、じゃあ来年やります、バンド。
subtitles.english: Ah, then we'll do it next year, the band.

subtitles.original: 楽しみ！
subtitles.english: Looking forward to it!

subtitles.original: もうイオフィったら本当にやりそうだから。
subtitles.english: Geez, Iofi, you really look like you'd do it.

subtitles.original: 怖い。
subtitles.english: Scary.

subtitles.original: ということで来年楽しみにしていてくださいね。
subtitles.english: So please look forward to next year.

subtitles.original: 絶対に、本当に怖い... みんな本気にするよ。
subtitles.english: Definitely, really scary... everyone will take it seriously.

subtitles.original: みんな本気にしちゃうよこれ。
subtitles.english: Everyone will take this seriously.

subtitles.original: 怖い怖い。
subtitles.english: Scary, scary.

subtitles.original: じゃあ来年楽しみということで。
subtitles.english: Then, looking forward to next year.

subtitles.original: 本当に皆見てくれてありがとう。これからもね、まだまだあるので。
subtitles.english: Truly, thank you everyone for watching. There's still more to come.

subtitles.original: まだまだあるので。
subtitles.english: There's still more.

subtitles.original: うん、楽しんでください。
subtitles.english: Yeah, please enjoy.

subtitles.original: 楽しんでー！おめでとー！またねー！ありがとー！楽しんでねー！
subtitles.english: Enjoy! Congratulations! See you! Thank you! Enjoy!

subtitles.original: ぼくらのレットイットビー
subtitles.english: Our Let It Be

subtitles.original: 生まれ変われるのなら
subtitles.english: If we could be reborn

subtitles.original: 目印になるから前を向いてよ
subtitles.english: I'll be your landmark, so look forward

subtitles.original: 小指と小指の長い糸
subtitles.english: The long thread between our pinkies

subtitles.original: 解けないように結んだの
subtitles.english: I tied it so it wouldn't come undone

subtitles.original: 夏祭り 夜雨降り
subtitles.english: Summer festival, night rain falls

subtitles.original: 空に虹が掛かる
subtitles.english: A rainbow appears in the sky

subtitles.original: 頃なの
subtitles.english: It's around that time

subtitles.original: 壊れた感情じゃ いつか君を消してゆく
subtitles.english: With broken emotions, I'll eventually erase you

subtitles.original: 見えなくなると失われる灯火
subtitles.english: A light that is lost when it becomes invisible

subtitles.original: でも結んだ長い糸 ほどけ落ちていないから
subtitles.english: But the long thread we tied hasn't come undone

subtitles.original: また僕たちは出会う時が来る きっと
subtitles.english: So the time will come for us to meet again, surely

subtitles.original: 僕ら大人になったら
subtitles.english: When we grow up

subtitles.original: 正義のヒーローになるんだ
subtitles.english: We'll become heroes of justice

subtitles.original: 地球の平和を守るのさ
subtitles.english: We'll protect the peace of the Earth

subtitles.original: 探検しようぜ お化け屋敷
subtitles.english: Let's explore the haunted house

subtitles.original: でも本当は怖くて 泣き虫
subtitles.english: But actually I'm scared, a crybaby

subtitles.original: 一緒にいたいだけ
subtitles.english: I just want to be together

subtitles.original: 明日は晴れて 空を仰いで照らせば
subtitles.english: If it's sunny tomorrow and the sky shines as we look up

subtitles.original: 僕らはここに秘密基地を作ろう
subtitles.english: Let's build a secret base here

subtitles.original: そして探検しよう
subtitles.english: And let's explore

subtitles.original: 雨ならゲームしよう
subtitles.english: If it rains, let's play games

subtitles.original: そんな時間が ずっと続くはずだったんだ そう
subtitles.english: Such times were supposed to last forever, yes

subtitles.original: 悪かったのは僕だった
subtitles.english: The one who was wrong was me

subtitles.original: 逃げ出したのは僕だった
subtitles.english: The one who ran away was me

subtitles.original: 嘘じゃない本当の嘘つきだ
subtitles.english: It's not a lie, I'm a real liar

subtitles.original: 花束に包まれて 目を瞑る君は
subtitles.english: Wrapped in a bouquet, you who closed your eyes

subtitles.original: 安らかに 清らかに 眠っていたんだ
subtitles.english: Were sleeping peacefully and purely

subtitles.original: 壊れた感情が
subtitles.english: Broken emotions

subtitles.original: いつか君を消してゆこう
subtitles.english: Will eventually erase you

subtitles.original: 失う前に
subtitles.english: Before losing

subtitles.original: 消えてしまう前に
subtitles.english: Before disappearing

subtitles.original: ただ結んだ長い糸 ほどけ落ちていなかった
subtitles.english: The long thread we just tied hadn't come undone

subtitles.original: きっと僕たちは...
subtitles.english: Surely we...
